text.section: Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, a physician shall evaluate a permanent impairment and report the evaluation to the Commission in accordance with the regulations of the Commission.

If a permanent impairment involves a behavioral or mental disorder, a licensed psychologist or qualified physician shall:
perform an evaluation of only the mental or behavioral portion of the permanent impairment; and
report the evaluation to the Commission in accordance with the regulations of the Commission.
